member.name: IUserActivitySourceHostInterop.SetActivitySourceHost
member.summary: Associates host information with either a UserActivityChannel or the UserActivity object.
member.param: An HSTRING containing the host to be associated with the user activity.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IUserActivitySourceHostInterop
member.summary: Enables interoperability with a WinRT a UserActivityChannel or a UserActivity object and provides the ability to associate host information with these objects.
